titleStmt.title: An order and declaration of His Highness and the council, for an assessment of sixty thousand pounds per mensem, for six monthes; from the five and twentieth of December 1655, to the four and twentieth of June 1656. Tuesday the 27th of November, 1655. Ordered by His Highness the Lord Protector, and the council, that this order and declaration be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Clerk of the Council.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and Iohn Field, Printer to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: The final leaf bears an order to print dated: Wednesday Nov. 28 1655.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
